stories.text:
For a very long time companies have been facing difficulties finding a perfect fitting HR solution for a budget price.

An Indian startup, Zeus Technologies, is a software company, known for its HRMS solution. The company primarily focuses on fulfilling the need for an adequate and fully-fledged enterprise-level software solution.

In 2017, Vinod Shukla (founder and CEO), along with Vinit Pandey (CTO) started working on an idea, proposing a solution for an essential need of a viable human resource management system.

In 2019, the product was introduced as a beta version in some of the startups. And after a few positive responses, in 2021, the product was successfully launched into the mainstream market.

The company grew rapidly even in the COVID-19 pandemic. Being a human resource expert for more than 12 years and understanding the market demand, Vinod inspected each aspect of problems that are being faced by companies nowadays, and hence trying to solve the exact same problem which has been sticking around for ages.

EasyFace, a Zeus' product, claims to cost-cut up to 50% of the management cost for the companies by providing the cheapest face attendance system out there.
stories.title: A Next-Gen leap in human resource: Zeus Technologies

stories.text:
From my personal experience, Reddit.com is full of bugs. Right now, I'm trying to write a reply and copy some quote. The quote is getting copied like thrice upon doing it once. CTRL + backspace is deleting words like a thresher gone haywire. Every now and then, my karma count fluctuates. Sometimes it's even 0.

I really didn't want to write this here and defame a site but I am really bound. People from Reddit Inc., if you're seeing this, please do something about it. Really it's taking me a lot of time trying to write a reply. I'm not saying this happens all the time when I open reddit but that's the point, I don't know when it'll go haywire. It needs fixing.
stories.title: Tell HN: Reddit is a nightmare and a dream for bugs
